Mapper module¶

class placement.mapper.AbstractMapper(checker: placement.checker.AbstractChecker)[source]¶

Abstract class for Mappers that perform VNF placements

map(infra, ns) → dict[source]¶

Maps a network service on top of an infrastructure.

Infra

infrastructure graph

Ns

network service graph

Returns

dict: mapping decissions dictionary

class placement.mapper.GreedyCostMapper(checker: placement.checker.AbstractChecker, k: int)[source]¶

Mapper to minimize cost of placing the network service. It traverses the network service graph node by node, deciding at each step the mapping of the node and the edge that connects it with the next one. That is, it follows a greedy approach.

map(infra: networkx.classes.digraph.DiGraph, ns: networkx.classes.digraph.DiGraph) → dict[source]¶

Maps a network service on top of an infrastructure.

class placement.checker.CheckBasicDigraphs[source]¶

Checker for network services and infrastructure graphs as the shown below:

>>> infra = nx.DiGraph()
>>> infra.add_node('h1', cpu=2, mem=16, disk=1024, rats=['LTE', 'MMW'],
        location=(39.1408046,-1.0795603))
>>> infra.add_node('h2', cpu=1, mem=8, disk=512)
>>> infra.add_edge('h1', 'h2', bw=100, delay=1)

>>> ns = nx.DiGraph()
>>> ns.add_node('v1', cpu=1, mem=4, disk=100, rats=['LTE'],
        location={'center': (39.128380, -1.080805), 'radius': 20})
>>> ns.add_node('v2', cpu=1, mem=1, disk=400)
>>> ns.add_edge('v1', 'v2', bw=59, delay=100)
